projects.title: Software Development Engineer Internship - 2022
projects.description: At Amazon, we hire the best minds in technology to innovate and build on behalf of our customers. The intense focus we have on our customers is why we are one of the world’s most beloved brands – customer obsession is part of our company DNA. Our interns write real software and collaborate with a select group of experienced software development engineers (SDEs) who guide interns on projects that matter to our customers. As an intern, you will be matched to a manager and a mentor. You will have the opportunity to influence the evolution of Amazon technology and lead mission critical projects early in your career. Your design, code, and raw smarts will contribute to solving some of the most complex technical challenges in the areas of distributed systems, data mining, automation, optimization, scalability, and security – just to name a few. In addition to working on an impactful project, you will have the opportunity to engage with Amazonians for both personal and professional development, expand your network, and participate in activities with other interns throughout your internship. No matter the location of your internship, we give you the tools to own your project and learn in a real-world setting. Many of our technologies overlap, and you would be hard pressed to find a team that is not using Amazon Web Services (AWS), touching the catalogue, or iterating services to better personalize for customers. If this opportunity interests you, apply and come chart your own path at Amazon. By applying to this position your application will be considered for all locations we hire for in India. Amazon internships are full-time (40 hours/week) for eight consecutive weeks (two months) with start dates between April and May 2022 or six months (as per university academic framework) with start dates between January and February 2022. KEY JOB RESPONSIBILITIES • • Collaborate with experienced cross-disciplinary Amazonians to conceive, design, and bring innovative products and services to market. • • Design and build innovative technologies in a large distributed computing environment, and help lead fundamental changes in the industry. • • Create solutions to run predictions on distributed systems with exposure to innovative technologies at incredible scale and speed. • • Build distributed storage, index, and query systems that are scalable, fault-tolerant, low cost, and easy to manage/use. • • Ability to design and code the right solutions starting with broadly defined problems. • • Work in an agile environment to deliver high-quality software. BASIC QUALIFICATIONS • • Currently enrolled in a Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related field at time of application. • • Knowledge of the syntax of languages such as Java, C/C++ or Python. • • Knowledge of Computer Science fundamentals such as object-oriented design, algorithm design, data structures, problem solving, and complexity analysis. PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS • • Previous technical internship(s), if applicable. • • Experience with distributed, multi-tiered systems, algorithms, and relational databases. • • Experience in optimization mathematics such as linear programming and nonlinear optimization. • • Ability to effectively articulate technical challenges and solutions. • • Adept at handling ambiguous or undefined problems as well as ability to think abstractly. Applications are reviewed on a rolling basis. For an update on your status, or to confirm your application was submitted successfully, please login to your candidate portal. NOTE: Amazon works with a high volume of applicants so we appreciate your patience as we review applications. Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

projects.title: Information Extraction from Unstructured Documents
projects.description: A vast majority of information in an enterprise flow through unstructured documents such as contracts, policies, creatives, application forms etc. Moreover, a financial organization such as ours often encounters financial documents including bank statements, balance sheets, invoices for several credit and risk decisioning. Generally, organization rely on manual efforts to understand and interpret these unstructured documents and spend a huge efforts and time to extract relevant information from these documents. In this project we aim to develop novel capabilities to extract relevant information from such unstructured documents into structured key-value pairs. The project will consider both form-based (invoices, balance sheets, bank statements) and verbose documents (i.e. financial statements, contracts, policies) and requires research attitude along with strong problem-solving skills and relevant technical skills including NLP (scikit Learn), ML algorithms, deep learning frameworks (pytorch, tensorflows) and advanced python programming is must. *Expected learning : Exposure to work on business problems in industry labs and thus learn to apply your knowledge to drive real impact Work on cutting-edge R&D initiatives to solve some of the most challenging and impactful problems Opportunities to work seasoned researchers to publish patents and papers in the top conferences.*Any specific courses : Introduction to Algorithms, Introduction to Programming, Linear Algebra
projects.skills: Python , Machine learning , NLP , Deep Learning

projects.title: Document Visual Understanding
projects.description: Documents in an enterprise may be of different types and formats including native PDFs, scanned images, webpages, emails and can follow different templates, which makes document processing and understanding an arduous task. These documents comprise a huge variety of information primarily represented as text, figures, and tables. While a lot of emphasis is on automated understanding and analyzing the textual information; tables and figures are ignored and are left for human analysis. The idea of document visual understanding includes building capabilities to recognizing the layout of these unstructured documents including detecting and interpreting tables, figures, title, text etc. and fetching information directly from these components in a question answering settings. This could potentially open a huge opportunity for the enterprise to systematically tap into the rich information present in unstructured documents. This project will involve applications of computer vision, machine learning, deep learning, and NLP techniques to create representations of documents from their visual cues and build applications such information retrieval, question answering etc. Proficiency in python programming, decent understanding of ML and deep learning is pre-requisite for this project.*Expected learning: Exposure to work on business problems in industry labs and thus learn to apply your knowledge to drive real impact Work on cutting-edge R&D initiatives to solve some of the most challenging and impactful problems Opportunities to work seasoned researchers to publish patents and papers in the top conferences *Any specific courses : Introduction to Algorithms, Introduction to Programming, Linear Algebra
